N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 435.7 - Training

State Regulations
(a) Individual providers approved pursuant to
section
435.6
of this Part must receive
training in the areas of child development, behavior management, communication, need for respite care and services and basic crisis intervention
techniques. (b) Approved respite
care and services providers who care for children or foster children with AIDS, HIV infection or HIV related illness must have experience caring for such
children or must receive training relating to the nature and history of AIDS, HIV infection and HIV-related illness, the needs of children who have AIDS, HIV
infection or HIV-related illness, and procedures for the care of such children
either prior to or at the same time as the provider cares for such children. This subdivision applies to all approved respite care and services providers as
defined in section
435.2
(b) of this

Part, including staff of such providers where applicable. Notes
